main_definition: Morning is the early part of the day, typically from sunrise until noon.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Time of day between midnight and noon
meanings_and_examples.example: I usually go for a run in the morning before starting my workday.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Beginning of the day when people wake up
meanings_and_examples.example: He made breakfast while waiting for his wife to wake up in the morning.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A specific time that marks the start of a work or school day
meanings_and_examples.example: The office opens at 9 AM, so I have to be there by then.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used to describe someone's energy levels after waking up (slightly informal)
meanings_and_examples.example: I feel so energized in the morning; it's like I could conquer the world!
